channel.title: Byte Magazine on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Byte Magazine on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Blogging Before it Was Cool
item.description: [big]Of all the people it’s sucked to lose in 2017, Jerry Pournelle’s loss might quietly be the saddest.[/big] Case in point: His final blog post, published Thursday. He noted the cold he was dealing with after attending a convention, wrote about immigration (Pournelle, an irreverent if hard-line conservative voice even at the height of his popularity, suggested that we let the “Dreamers” in after they serve seven years overseas in the military), and then overshared just a little bit before ending the post.
